# Results
```{r, eval = TRUE}
knitr::kable(mtcars[1:7,])
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
cgroup=c("A","B","C")
n.cgroup=c(2,2,1)

rgroup=c("OneToThree","Four","FiveToSix") 
n.rgroup=c(3,1,2)

z <- ztable(mtcars[1:6, 1:5], 
            booktabs = TRUE
       ) %>%
    addcgroup(
        cgroup = cgroup,
        n.cgroup = n.cgroup) %>%
    addrgroup(
        rgroup = rgroup,
        n.rgroup = n.rgroup,
        cspan.rgroup = 1)

print(z, type = "latex")


```
